page.title: 03 The Promenade
page.content: The cliff-top walks from Botany Bay to Foreness Bay (The Gallops) provide the area with wild flowers and birds, and a small golf course near which is the coast guard. The area of green and promenade towards Palm Bay is recreational, with the start of the Spring Thanet Marathon and Summer Margate Carnival. Tennis courts are available, and the Ship's Cannons are pleasure spots for walkers. The St.Georges Bowling Green and Cafe are found opposite Butlins, St.Georges Hotel. The Meteorological station is found here too. There is a bandstand, The Oval, open in summer, near which a Thursday market is held. The Crazy Golf course is found opposite the Ten Pin Bowling Alley. At the Lido, tourists listen to the organist, play Bingo or gamble in the Arcades.
